attributes.action: Stop electricity suppliers adding standing charges to their bills
attributes.additional_details: It’s an unfair, unpredictable and unnecessary charge. Consumers are paying for a meter that  benefits the electricity supplier more than the consumer. Electricity is never cheap and adding this unreasonable charge is simply a way of making more guaranteed money for the supplier, especially if the consumer tries to cut down on consumption
attributes.background: Electricity companies should not be able to add an additional charge for a meter once it’s installed. Not only do consumers pay for the meter over and over again ; the cost is at the whim of the supplier. Oil tanks and internet routers, once paid for, aren’t subject to further charges

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621561
